website_summaries.verdict: The ioSafe Solo G3 makes an excellent backup solution for those who need to make sure their important data survives even the worst disasters.
pros: The quiet and good-looking ioSafe Solo G3 offers stellar performance with USB 3.0 and is designed to safeguard your data against fire and water damage
The drive includes a year of data-recovery service that offers up to $2,500 toward the cost of data retrieving
cons: The ioSafe Solo G3 is a single-volume storage solution hence offers no protection against the case its only internal hard drive fails
The device is also very heavy and bulky

customer_reviews.title: HD died after 2 years...
customer_reviews.text: Lasted about 2 years then hard drive completely failed. I pulled the HD from the case (it was out of warranty anyway) and hooked it up to multiple computers using multiple cables, connectors, and software programs...none of them could read it. Sent HD to iosafe for free analysis; was a major HD failure. Was quoted $1200+ for them to attempt data recovery on the 2TB drive (they would have to send it off to a forensic type of recovery service). Recommend either having multiple, repetitive backup devices to go with this or an extended data recovery plan.

customer_reviews.title: Replacing 10-year-old ioSafe
customer_reviews.text: I just bought a new one to replace its predecessor, which died without warning or symptoms after 10 years of service. That's why I give it four stars; perhaps I shouldn't expect a hard drive to last 10 years, but the only way I knew it had died was that it started making a small repetitive sound. I agree with the reviewers who say that a longer-term data recovery assistance program should be part of the purchase price. Having said that, it's a five-star performer; virtually silent, fast enough for my purposes, and great peace of mind. I will start making more frequent offsite backup copies in case of sudden death.

product_meta.title: Solo G3 2TB Fireproof and Waterproof External Hard Drive
product_meta.description: Perfect for sensitive ears in the home, home office or studio, the ioSafe Solo G3 with Data Recovery Service (DRS) is a fanless fortress for your data. For users that demand that data storage be protected and not heard — the Solo G3 with the latest fanless FloSafe Vent Technology is strong and silent. Combining an array of proprietary technology the ioSafe Solo G3 + DRS delivers unparalleled protection for your digital life in a solution that is pure simplicity.
feature_bullets: Fireproof - Protects data from loss up to 1550°F for 1/2 hour per ASTM E119
Waterproof - Protects data from flood. Fully submersed, fresh or salt water, 10 foot depth, 72 hours.
Data Recovery Service(DRS) for any reason.
Theft proof - Bolt down to any surface
